content.rendered:
Spring Toys

Spring is officially here! Celebrate warmer weather with Sunny Patch products by Melissa & Doug. Geared for outside fun, these colorful toys will entertain the whole family. Prices start at $6.97.



Literary Gifts

Come in and check out these bookworm-inspired items! Prices range from $0.50-$18.

Shane Gottwals on Middle Georgia CEO

Shane Gottwals was recently interviewed by Middle Georgia CEO. Here’s one of his responses. We are proud of our national brand… with roots in Middle GA!

Egg Hunt in a Bookstore

We had fun hosting our first Easter egg hunt last weekend! We had more than 50 kids show up to our Macon and Warner Robins bookstores. They took home nearly 800 eggs filled with candy, toys, stickers, and vouchers! We intend to see you again next year for this family event.
